basic_usage.code:
from modules.batch_questions import BatchQuestionsManager

manager = BatchQuestionsManager()
template = manager.load_template('project-initialization')
responses = manager.execute_batch(template)
basic_usage.expected_output: Dictionary of user responses keyed by question ID

skill_specific.code:
from modules.batch_questions import ask_skill_questions

# Ask questions for config manager skill
responses = ask_skill_questions('do-project-config-manager')
print(responses)

validation.error_message: Project name must start with letter and contain only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores

with_config_manager.code:
# Process responses into config
config = manager.process_responses_for_config(
    responses, 
    config_path='.do/config/config.yaml'
)
# Save updated config
with open('.do/config/config.yaml', 'w') as f:
    json.dump(config, f, indent=2)

with_menu_system.code:
# Get questions for menu setup
template = manager.get_skill_specific_template('do-menu-project')
responses = manager.execute_batch(template)
# Apply to menu configuration
menu_config = manager.process_responses_for_config(responses)

conditional_workflows.code:
# Get language configuration
lang_responses = ask_skill_questions('do-project-language-initializer')

# Conditionally ask framework questions based on language
if lang_responses.get('language.primary') == 'python':
    framework_responses = ask_skill_questions('python-frameworks', lang_responses)
